courseDescription:
Every organisation and workplace's performance and growth are dependent on the managers' direction and leadership qualities. The ability to manage a workplace is therefore a critical component of an organisation's and workplace's motivation. This course gives you the skills you'll need to raise employee morale and motivate them to perform more efficiently. We'll start by helping you grasp management and leadership principles and the process of building a high-performing team in the workplace. After that, you'll discover various employee-motivating strategies and ways of managing talents and constructing a successful succession plan.

Time management is an important ability to help you operate efficiently under pressure and fulfil deadlines. This course will show you how to plan assignments and avoid procrastination. You will study the ‘Pareto Principle‘ concept of time management and explore other techniques to deal with job stress. You'll then understand how to cope with workplace issues and promote peaceful coexistence among coworkers. Subsequently, we will explain the different types of personalities in the workplace and various risk management tactics.

Identifying essential disciplines within your organisation and making action plans for people to fill those jobs is what succession planning entails. It identifies weaknesses and skill gaps in the workplace, promotes training and development and protects your brand's integrity and reputation. This course will teach you how to construct high-performing teams and develop effective succession plans. Learn how to manage time, stress and dangers in the office, encourage people and increase overall workplace efficiency!
